name.en: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun
name.jp: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun

desc.en: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千禧年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.jp: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程部。工程部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长咏叶见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程部。工程部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。

desc.en: All of the Game Development Department went to the Engineering Department with Aris.
desc.jp: All of the Game Development Department went to the Engineering Department with Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程部。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程师部。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程部。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.jp: Example: Aoharu

desc.jp: Example: Aoharu

desc.jp: Example: Lovely Picnic

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: BG_GameDevRoom.jpg Description
desc.jp: BG_GameDevRoom.jpg Description

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。琴里主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Hibiki continued adjusting for Aris, yet Utaha noticed that Aris was in fact a machine and was worried for her abilities.
desc.jp: Hibiki continued adjusting for Aris, yet Utaha noticed that Aris was in fact a machine and was worried for her abilities.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而歌原察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而咏叶察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而歌原察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。
